6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade praying after 'Asr until the sun had set, and after Subh until the sun had risen

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الصُّبْحِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Praying After Subh
